title: How to score 90% in the NEET - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: Well…90% in NEET means 648 marks . It's not a piece of cake…and also it's not a too big deal. Look, for a approx score of 650 marks, you need to have command over all three subjects. In , biology: 85 +ve /340 Physics: 39–40 +ve / 156_160 Chemistry: 40+ve /160 That's just a sorted preassumption by me. The things which you can do now are listed below⬇ It's now Jan 9,so partying, vacations, trips, sleeping duration>7 hours, non healthy eating etc keep aside.Time is very less. So it should not be spent in getting medical treatment. Please keep yourself damn fit.Maintain a good schedule, compatible with school and institute timings.Fix the duration of 6 hours for sleeping. Best duration according to me would be 22:00 h to 04:00 h. Try iff possible. Otherwise you can keep 2400 h to 6:00H too.Don't procrastinate any task. Jo bhi work you are given, be it in school or Institute, usko usi din khatam kr do.Now your pre boards would be going on….or may have got over. So it's high time to buckle up for boards . Do one thing go twice thoroughly through NCERTS . In all subjects. Especially PCB.You can't skip it because NCERTS are like hidden treasures. No one knows what can be asked directly from its text. Sometimes few intrinsic thermodynamic properties are preffered over big bulky numerical problem. So first complete all NCERTS very very very well!!Please don't leave solving MCQs. Your score ultimately depends on your practising strength. Knowledge comes secondary, it's application is primary. So be analytical 🔥🔥…rather than cramming, understand the things you will score sky touching marks😊Do repeated revisions. Your all labour is worthless if it remains unrevised. Many students would be there who keep mugging up, covering up new topics till the end like till April 🔚…. Please for God's sake don't do this. Till month of March complete course 2_3 times. Then only revision. Start revisions from January itself. You will master the things by exams ☺Last thing, have firm belief in yourself. You are smart, you wanna definitely do it. Keep practising questions as much as you can. Take tests. Evaluate yourself. Do physical activity atleast 0.5 h in a day. Be positive🔰…you will rock 😎

Revise your syllabus daily. Solve previous year question papers Discuss your doubt with teacher. Take a proper rest, don’t feet pressure. Don’t confused Focus #if u follow these point you will get. Thank you.. regards Mayank.
